items.content_html: Telegramsjs - is a lightweight Node.js library for creating Telegram bots. It is designed to be a framework and does not rely on third-party libraries such as Telegraf.js or node-telegram-bot-api. This library provides a way to create Telegram bots with ease and flexibility.
items.title: telegramsjs/Telegramsjs: Telegramsjs - is a lightweight Node.js library for creating Telegram bots. It is designed to be a framework and does not rely on third-party libraries such as Telegraf.js or node-telegram-bot-api. This library provides a way to create Telegram bots with ease and flexibility.

items.content_html: ⏱️ Fast, accurate and lightweight countdown & stopwatch written in Typescript.
items.title: IgorKowalczyk/countdown: ⏱️ Fast, accurate and lightweight countdown & stopwatch written in Typescript.

items.content_html: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
items.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/anyGridJs: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.

items.content_html: This is simple game using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.This game is a classic twist on the well know "Rock-Paper-Scissors" game. In this web based verssion user choose between three option: snake, water and gun, and computer play against palyers and the rule are Snake beats water, water beats gun and gun beats snake. its lightweight, easy to play.
items.title: Sandip1bhatta/Simple-Snake-Water-and-Gun-Game: This is simple game using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.This game is a classic twist on the well know "Rock-Paper-Scissors" game. In this web based verssion user choose between three option: snake, water and gun, and computer play against palyers and the rule are Snake beats water, water beats gun and gun beats snake. its lightweight, easy to play.
